about_the_game:
Mysterious House is a captivating logic platformer where you solve puzzles, navigate obstacles, and use teleporters to progress through levels. Your main goal is to reach the teleporter, but the path is filled with challenges like closed doors, pits, and destructible blocks. You'll be assisted by helpers who can open doors and mimic your actions, but they need protection as they aren't very bright. With colorful graphics, engaging gameplay, and a variety of levels, this game offers a blend of strategy and platforming that keeps you on your toes.

Key Features:

  • Challenging Puzzles:

    Solve intricate puzzles to navigate through each level.

  • Unique Helpers:

    Helpers can open doors and mimic actions but require careful protection.

  • Vibrant Graphics:

    Enjoy colorful and detailed environments that enhance the gaming experience.

  • Engaging Gameplay:

    A mix of platforming and logic challenges keeps the gameplay fresh and exciting.

  • Varied Levels:

    Each level presents new challenges and requires creative solutions to progress.

name: Mysterious House

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT550M | AMD Radeon R7/HD 5650 | Intel HD 520
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT740M | AMD Radeon R8 | Intel HD 630
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Mysterious House is a logic platformer filled with puzzles and obstacles, where you must use teleporters and protect your helpers to overcome traps and reach your goal.
